addFeeDistributionReceiver((string,uint6.details: swapPath[] needs to have the base token address on position 0This method also checks if there is a valid swap path existing, otherwise it will be reverted by the aggregatoronly available to FEE_DISTRIBUTIOR_MANAGER role

params._params: contains the name, points, account address und swapPath for the receiver

disableFeeDistributorBounty().details: Disables the bounty possibilityonly available to FEE_DISTRIBUTIOR_MANAGER role

enableFeeDistributorBounty().details: Enables the bounty possibilityonly available to FEE_DISTRIBUTIOR_MANAGER role

returns._payout: amount being paid to recent receiver

getFeeDistributorTotalBounties().details: Gets the total bounties being paid

getFeeDistributorTotalPoints().details: Gets the current total points of all shares

params._baseToken: address of the expected token we get from the bridge
params._nativeWrapper: address of native wrapper token on the operating chain

isFeeDistributorBountyActive().details: check whether the bounty is active of not

isFeeDistributorBountyInToken().details: check whether the distributors bounty is paid in the token or not

returns._is: if true, it's paid in token

isFeeDistributorRunning().details: check whether the distributor is running of not

pushFees(address,uint256,(uint256,addres.details: an updated dto needs to be created since the receiving amount is not      matching the sent amount anymore. The contract will 100% receive the      _token _amount before being executedonly available to FEE_DISTRIBUTOR_PUSH_ROLE roleif the token doesn't match, it will fail.

params._dto: the dto of the fee store to determine the split of _amount

startFeeDistribution().details: It will be also check if the bounties are being activated and if there are already fees in the queue to process. If so, it'll be process on activating the fee distribution.only available to FEE_DISTRIBUTIOR_MANAGER role

updateFeeDistributionShares(address[],ui.details: if a receiver is not existing, it'll be revertedonly available to FEE_DISTRIBUTIOR_MANAGER role

params._shares: array of new shares to be set

enableBountyInToken(bool).notice: Enables  or disables the bountyInToken flag based on the given parameter

pushFees(address,uint256,(uint256,addres.notice: Pushes the fee to the desired receivers

removeFeeDistributionReceiver(address).notice: Removes a receiver based on the receiver address

setFeeDistributorBountyShare(uint64).notice: Sets the share of the bounty

setPushFeesGasCompensationForCaller(uint.notice: Sets the gas compensation for the caller of the push fee method

updateFeeDistributionShares(address[],ui.notice: Updates the shares of existing receivers

userdoc.notice: It is responsible for distributing received fees to its configured receivers
